gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.PersistentObject

Packages that use PersistentObject
gr.interamerican.bo2.arch This package contains the declaration of the Bo2 architecture. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.ext This package contains interfaces extending the Bo2 stereotypes to the application layer. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.utils.adapters   
gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.utils.collections This package contains implementations of collections for bo2 objects.

gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.listeners   
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.creation This package provides an approach to object creation for Bo2 projects.

gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate.operations   
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.hibernate.utils.reflect.beans   
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc This package contains implementations based on JDBC for the sub-interfaces of Worker that are defined in the package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc.parsed   
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.operations This package contains common reusable operations. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.po This package contains classes providing basic functionality relates to PersistentObject development. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.runtime This package contains classes of the runtime layer. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.transformations   
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.utils This package contains utility classes and resources used by all classes in the gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open package. 
gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers This package contains base implementations for Worker types declared in the architecture packages.
